commandDescription: Validates alignment between XML and CSV representations of profiles using string comparison or logic comparison
inputFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of profile names to validate (without extension). If not specified, all profiles will be validated
modeFlagDescription: Validation mode: 'string' for full string comparison, 'logic' for in-memory structure comparison (default: %s)
validationSummary: Validation Summary: %s profiles validated, %s aligned, %s misaligned
examples: sf easysources profiles arealigned -i Admin,StandardUser -m string
sf easysources profiles arealigned --sort false --mode string
